title: This is why I can't get out of Bronze 5

replies.body:
A good K/D/A does not equal skill. Sure you have a significantly better K/D/A than your team mates but we have no way of knowing how that occurred. For all we know you could have KSed for a significant amount of those kills. For all we know your team mates could have sacrificed themselves for you to escape death. We don't know what mistakes you made in the match, we don't know what amount of team work you displayed, we don't know. Don't think, for one second, that you are better simply because of your K/D/A. Game play is what matters.

PS: I feel you could benefit from this piece of advice: If you smell sh!t where ever you go it's best to check your own shoes first.

You got a good score in a game that the rest of your team didn't do so well.
What could you have done better to help them?
What could you have done better to carry harder? 
Who could you have played that would have fitted your team comp better?

I have climbed out of bronze V twice, I am sure you can do it too.

Bruh, you were mid. Your team isn't doing good? Then ROAM. You can't single carry a game in any elo, so make sure your team mates are in a position to back you up. Your team mates shouldn't have gotten behind in the first place, but then YOU should have accepted that it happened and tried to get them ahead.

you weren't carrying, your score isn't always clear, the lack of deaths from your lane counterpart pretty much tells me you were just last hitting kills in team fights and not asserting lane dominance and roaming (which is why ziggs is not a carrying mid laner) so stop posting stupid threads play a carry and stop bi***ing
